row.entry: By Balle due G. Wn. & chargd pr Contra
row.ClearText: By Balance due George Wasington & charged per Contra
By his Services as Cook 18 Months
By 48 Yards of coarse Virginia Cloth @ 4d
By 9 yards of fine Virginia Cloth @ 10d
By weaving 17 yards for a Carpet @ 5d
By weaving 3 pieces of Cloath viz. 39 yards
By weaving 1 pair Woolen Cloth 33 1/2 yards @ 4d
By weaving 1 pair Woolen Checked cloth 40 1/2 yards 5d
